resources.string:
AixiliarIT is an app created by Limkokwing FICT student as a proof of concept. It is dedicated for Limkokwing FICT students only and the goal of this app is to facilitate their semester.


*On first use, you are urged to add the subject you are having before using other features.


Features:


- Latest news from Limkokwing.


- Adding and removing subjects (up-to 10).


- Creating your own TimeTable.


- Lecturers information that you need.


- Search for your class or University's departments.


- Information about the bus and where to wait for it (If you're new).


- Organizing the Assignments.
Note: if you want to travel from Limkokwing to any other place, the bus named T520 come - Monday to Friday - every 40 minutes and in weekends come every 1 hour until 11 pm
